name: Monty & Keyro [Demo]
description:
Monty & Keyro are twins, that behave very differently, Keyro makes an attempt to motivate Monty to get a job somewhere, but the day starts getting weirder

This project was an attempt to practice using the gameboy green color palette, and also an attempt to make a light rpg maker game since most of them are 200mb and up.
This project is on hold because I'm not sure if people really enjoy my creations, but I wanted to see if this demo gets any feedback and people interested in getting more of this project, resulting in updates and better art. 

Let me know if you're interested in supporting me and my projects, since that would be a huge help to me
